articles.title: Harvest Market: Rustic Turkey Bolognese Recipe
articles.author: Jaclyn Friedlander
articles.summary: Starbucks introduced a new menu to help customers warm up during winter. The menu represents a new product offering from the company.

articles.title: Nvidia's new graphics cards double down on AI
articles.author: Timothy Green
articles.summary: Nvidia has launched its RTX 50 series graphics cards, featuring the Blackwell architecture, promising twice the performance of previous generations. This is enabled by the fourth generation of DLSS (DLSS 4), an AI-powered technology suite that boosts frame rates and improves visual quality, as well as the introduction of RTX Neural Rendering which uses AI to accelerate tasks at runtime and RTX Neural Faces which generates realistic faces for characters. The RTX 50 series will launch with 75 games supporting DLSS 4.

articles.title: 6 self-cleaning cat litter boxes you can buy on Amazon, starting at just $300
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: Amazon offers self-cleaning litter boxes that automatically clean, prevent odors, and provide a healthier environment for cats. These devices also monitor cat health metrics like weight and usage. These products provide automated solutions for pet owners.

articles.title: 23 Ways To Look A *Lot* More Put-Together With Only A *Little* Bit Of Effort
articles.author: Ana Maria Glavan
articles.summary: Wet 'n' wild introduced a cruelty-free liquid lipstick available on Amazon for $2.24+ in six colors. I Dew Care launched dry shampoo featuring biotin, black ginseng, and root-boosting powder, sold on Amazon for $12.59+ in 11 shades.  Supergoop! released Glowscreen SPF40 with hyaluronic acid, vitamin B5, and niacinamide, available on Amazon for $18+ in two sizes.  Fanola offers a purple shampoo on Amazon for $7.97+ in four sizes, addressing brassiness in hair. Nooni launched Appleberry Lip Oil with vitamins A, C, and E, along with apple water and raspberry extract, priced at $9.99+ on Amazon and Cake Beauty offers The Curl Friend Defining Cream for $10.99 on Amazon.

articles.title: Reserve the New Samsung Galaxy S25 Smartphone and Get in on Extra Savings Ahead of Galaxy Unpacked 2025
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its Galaxy S25 series smartphones, building upon the success of the Galaxy S24 Ultra. The new series is rumored to include improved displays, faster processors, enhanced camera systems potentially featuring a 200MP sensor, and advancements in AI-driven photography and offers incentives for early reservations, including credits and trade-in savings.

articles.title: Wendy's Cheeseburgers Are Just 25 Cents Right Now—Here's How to Snag One
articles.author: Robin Shreeves
articles.summary: Wendy's is partnering with Grubhub to offer its Dave's Single for 25 cents. Customers need to order at least $20 worth of food through Grubhub at a participating Wendy's location to avail the offer. The promotion is valid until January 13.

articles.title: Official Galaxy S25 wallpapers leak, and you can download them here
articles.author: Timi Cantisano
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy S25, featuring new wallpapers and the Qi2 wireless charging standard. Reservations are open, offering a $50 credit towards a future purchase before the January 22 event.

articles.title: 6 News at 5 p.m. for 1/8/2025
articles.summary: Starbucks introduces a new menu to provide customers with warming options during the winter.

articles.title: CES 2025: The 15 most impressive products so far
articles.author: Allison Murray
articles.summary: Samsung's new TVs integrate AI upscaling for improved content viewing, including HDR Remastering. LG's AI-powered TVs feature voice recognition, AI chatbots, and an AI Concierge for personalized recommendations. TCL introduced the QM6K, an entry-level QLED TV with Mini LED technology, available for pre-order with a free soundbar.

articles.title: LG Showcases Life Enhanced by Affectionate Intelligence at World Premiere Event
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: LG Electronics introduced 'Affectionate Intelligence,' an AI concept focused on creating empathetic and personalized user experiences. LG acquired Athom, a provider of smart home solutions, to enhance connectivity with IoT devices from various brands, positioning LG as a leader in the smart home industry.

articles.title: Bride 2 Be Giveaway
articles.summary: Starbucks is introducing a new menu to help customers warm up this winter. This constitutes a new product offering from the company.

articles.title: Starbox Unveils StarboxAI-IntelliDistribute, an AI-Driven Smart Information Distribution System to Transform Advertising for 180 Degrees Brandcom  Jan. 8, 2025 22:00
articles.summary: Starbox Group Holdings Ltd. launched StarboxAI-IntelliDistribute, an AI-driven smart information distribution system, through its subsidiary, Starbox Technologies Sdn. Bhd. This system is designed to streamline and optimize the advertising process, offering data-driven insights, content personalization, smart scheduling, and multi-platform integration. 180 Degrees Brandcom will adopt StarboxAI-IntelliDistribute to enhance its advertising strategies.

articles.title: SONIC Kicks Off the Year with a Late-Winter Menu
articles.author: Source Staff
articles.summary: SONIC Drive-In has launched a new menu including the Bacon Deluxe Double SONIC Smasher, a premium cheeseburger, and two new premium drinks, the Strawberry Fusion Fizz, a sparkling water infusion, and the Sour Dragon Fruit Recharger with Red Bull, a bold blend of Red Bull®, lemon lime soda, tangy lemon, sweet grape and exotic dragon fruit. A portion of every drink purchase supports public education through the SONIC Limeades for Learning® initiative.

articles.title: Dry January Mocktail Menu with Alley Twenty Six
articles.author: Amber Freeman
articles.summary: Starbucks introduced a new menu to help customers warm up during the winter season.

articles.title: Fresh Blends® to Showcase New Organic Menu and Cutting-edge Blender Technology at Industry Trade Shows in 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
org: School Nutrition Association – SNA of NC
articles.summary: Fresh Blends is launching a new and improved USDA certified organic menu featuring fruit and vegetable smoothies, oat milk shakes, frozen lemonades, and juices over ice. They are also introducing enhancements to their Fresh Blender technology with the new Ecoblend+ technology that ensures faster blending, and an advanced sanitation system. The company will showcase these innovations at key trade shows in 2025.

articles.title: Fresh Blends® to Showcase New Organic Menu and Cutting-edge Blender Technology at Industry Trade Shows in 2025
articles.author: Fresh Blends North America
articles.summary: Fresh Blends will showcase a new organic menu and cutting-edge blender technology at industry trade shows in 2025. The company intends to introduce this new menu along with the new blender technology.

articles.title: Vote for Athlete of the Week 1/8/25
articles.author: Spencer Gustafson
articles.summary: Starbucks introduced a new menu to provide customers with warming options during the winter season.

articles.title: Is Samsung's AI Subscription Club a vision of tech's future?
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: Samsung has launched an AI Subscription Club in Korea, offering a subscription-based model for access to various products like TVs, refrigerators, washing machines, and even its Ballie home robot. This service allows customers to rent Samsung products with AI features for a monthly fee, providing a potentially more affordable option compared to outright purchase.

articles.title: Tysons Mr Wash Car Wash Offering Snow Storm Special: Deals
articles.author: Michael O'Connell
articles.summary: Mr Wash Car Wash is offering a limited-time 'Snow Storm Special' at its newest Tysons Corner location. The special provides unlimited car washes for the first two months at $9.99 per month, aimed at protecting cars from corrosive elements after the snowstorm.

articles.title: Swiggy unboxes professional services app Pyng under house of apps strategy
articles.author: Digbijay Mishra
articles.summary: Swiggy is launching Pyng, a professional services marketplace app, and Snacc, a 15-minute food delivery app. Zomato has also launched a 15-minute food delivery service within its main app, while Blinkit introduced Bistro, a 10-minute food delivery app. These launches reflect a strategy of diversifying services and creating incremental growth.

articles.title: New Stuff Alert: Araks for J.Crew and Ceremonia Dry Shampoo
articles.author: Ambar Pardilla
articles.summary: Araks and J.Crew released understated underthings. Nécessaire launched a lip balm with niacinamide and hyaluronic acid. Credo has expanded into body-care with a ceramide serum, green algae cream, and mineral wash. Ceremonia introduced a dry shampoo powder. Great Jones launched Little Saucy cookware. Brooklinen launched Featherweight bed blankets and Uniqlo and JW Anderson released spring/summer collection.

articles.title: Lily AI Launches the Winter 2025 Release of its AI-powered Product Attributes Platform
articles.summary: Lily AI is launching new product developments that empower retailers and brands to optimize Google Ads performance, accelerate marketplace growth, and enhance team efficiency. These innovations are designed to improve retail search and discovery using AI by bridging the gap between merchant-speak and customer-speak and offer industry-first solutions.

articles.title: Yocan Vane 2: Elevating Portability and Performance for Dry Herb Enthusiasts
articles.summary: Yocan introduced the Yocan Vane 2, a premium dry herb vaporizer, on January 8, 2025, in Shenzhen, China. The Vane 2 features cutting-edge technology and a sleek design. Yocan also offers the Draco Mini grinder, which is designed to be paired with the Vane 2.

articles.title: MSI's New Gaming PC Has a Screen On The Case
articles.author: Arol Wright
articles.summary: MSI has announced the MEG VISION X AI 2nd, a prebuilt gaming PC featuring a 13-inch FHD touchscreen that integrates with the MSI AI app and voice interaction. The system includes Intel's Core Ultra 9 processor 285K, supports DDR5 UDIMM slots and NVMe SSDs compatible with PCIe 5.0, and features NVIDIA's RTX 5000-series cards.

articles.title: Lily AI Launches the Winter 2025 Release of its AI-powered Product Attributes Platform
articles.author: Lily AI
articles.summary: Lily AI announced the Winter 2025 release of its product attributes platform, which introduces advanced features designed to optimize product catalogs for retailers and brands. This release empowers performance marketers by maximizing Google ad spend and automates catalog enrichment to drive sales for both 1st and 3rd party sellers.

articles.title: New products are on the market, freckle removal miracle solution launched
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A new freckle removal product is launched, promising an unprecedented transformation for beauty seekers aiming for a clear and flawless complexion.

articles.title: Steam Ate Microsoft's Lunch On PC, It's About To Do The Same On Handhelds
articles.author: Zack Zwiezen
articles.summary: Valve is making SteamOS more accessible for installation on various devices, aiming to establish it as the default OS for portable PC gaming. Lenovo has announced the first third-party device that will ship with SteamOS, indicating wider adoption of the OS. Microsoft is trying to catch up.

articles.title: Latest Pelican Point Full of Beanz Coffee drive-through opening next step in company expansion
articles.summary: Pelican Point Full of Beanz Coffee is expanding with the launch of its latest drive-through location.

articles.title: Samsung to launch tri-fold smartphone in 2025
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Samsung is planning to release its first tri-fold smartphone in the second half of 2025. The initial production will be limited to fewer than 300,000 units, and the device will feature a design that fully protects the screen when folded, unlike Huawei's Mate XT. The screen can be unfolded to 10.5 inches or 12.4 inches, supplied by Samsung Display.

articles.title: Get free white glove delivery and $300 off a new Saatva mattress for 2025
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Saatva is offering a New Year sale providing $300 off orders of $1,000 or more, accompanied by free white glove delivery service on their premium mattresses.  The sale showcases mattresses crafted with eco-friendly materials and advanced sleep technology, including a 180-night home trial and a 15-year warranty.

articles.title: Get free white glove delivery and $300 off a new Saatva mattress for 2025
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Saatva is offering $300 off orders of $1,000 or more, plus free white glove delivery service on their mattresses. The New Year mattress sale includes popular models like Saatva Classic and Saatva Latex Hybrid. Saatva provides a 180-night home trial and a 15-year warranty on their mattresses.

articles.title: Get free white glove delivery and $300 off a new Saatva mattress for 2025
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Saatva is offering $300 off orders of $1,000 or more, plus free white glove delivery service for New Year. They also provide a generous 180-night home trial and a 15-year non-prorated warranty on their mattresses.

articles.title: Get free white glove delivery and $300 off a new Saatva mattress for 2025
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Saatva is offering $300 off orders of $1,000 or more, plus free white glove delivery service for New Year. Their white glove delivery includes in-room delivery, setup, and free removal of old mattresses. Saatva also provides a 180-night home trial and a 15-year non-prorated warranty on their mattresses.

articles.title: Get free white glove delivery and $300 off a new Saatva mattress for 2025
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Saatva is offering $300 off orders of $1,000 or more on their mattresses, plus free white glove delivery service for the New Year. Their mattresses include the Saatva Classic, Rx, Latex Hybrid, Memory Foam Hybrid, and Contour5 models. Saatva also provides a 180-night home trial and a 15-year non-prorated warranty on their mattresses.

articles.title: Green Meadows Teams Up with Colorado-based JuanaDips to Launch Award-Winning THC Pouches in Massachusetts
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Green Meadows is launching JuanaDips, award-winning THC pouches, in Massachusetts. These smokeless cannabis pouches, developed with Palisade Apothecary, offer a discreet and flavorful experience. JuanaDips will initially be available in Spearmint flavor with varying THC doses, with plans for new flavors and dosing levels in early 2025.

articles.title: Green Meadows Teams Up with Colorado-based JuanaDips to Launch Award-Winning THC Pouches in Massachusetts
articles.author: Green Meadows
articles.summary: Green Meadows is launching JuanaDips, award-winning THC pouches, in Massachusetts, starting this January at Green Meadows dispensaries and select retail partners. This launch follows the introduction of The TANK, a premium 1g disposable vape, and STELLAR, a 2g disposable vape.

articles.title: Robot beverage company names new CEO
articles.author: Cortney Danielle Moore
articles.summary: Fresh Blends has launched the Fresh Blender Plus, which features advanced sanitation capabilities that automate cleaning for up to six months and a self-pay option. Its Ecoblend+ technology enhances blending speed, flavor, and consistency while cutting blend times by 20%. Additionally, Fresh Blends is expanding its product lineup by introducing a certified organic menu and upgrading its manufacturing facilities.

articles.title: New 5D 'Captain America' Screening Will Literally Stain Your Clothes
articles.author: Ryan Britt
articles.summary: Tide and Marvel are partnering to offer "Collateral Stains" 5D screenings of Captain America: Brave New World. During these limited screenings, audience members will have substances thrown at them that may stain their clothes. Tide will be present at these events to help audience members remove the stains.

articles.title: NBCU, Fox, WBD, DirecTV & Comcast Execs Say Their Ad Collaboration Can Help Close Gap With Big Tech
articles.author: Dade Hayes
articles.summary: Universal Ads, a new venture, was announced to combat the domination of Google and Meta. The goal of Universal Ads is to make premium video advertising more widely available to small and mid-size businesses.

articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: AI-powered marketing startup launches out of Louisville area
articles.summary: MercenaryMarketing.ai launched with AI-generated marketing strategies and content creation for small businesses. The company offers services like consulting, digital media buying, and AI training, alongside products such as an 'out-of-the-box' chatbot starting at $55/month, on-demand video services up to $3,000/month, and an interactive avatar currently in beta testing.

articles.title: Epic Discounts
articles.author: Hugh Hegarty
articles.summary: Starbucks introduced a new menu to help customers warm up during winter.

articles.title: Dine 909: These 2 Mexican food restaurants are coming soon to the Inland Empire
articles.author: John Plessel
articles.summary: A new bakery has opened in Rialto. This represents the launch of a new food service business in the area.

articles.title: 6 News at Noon for 1/8/2025
articles.summary: Starbucks is introducing a new menu to help customers warm up during the winter.

articles.title: Wednesday, January 8th: Dry Jan. Mocktails, 1 of Us, Artie's Bars
articles.author: Trent Gilbreath
articles.summary: Starbucks introduces a new menu to help customers warm up during the winter season.

articles.title: This Automatic Dustpan Has Over 11,000 5-Star Reviews on Amazon. We're Not Impressed.
articles.summary: The EyeVac Touchless Vacuum Automatic Dustpan is a portable automatic dustpan that uses a motion sensor to detect when a broom is being swept toward it and then uses suction to pick up debris. The product is intended to eliminate stooping to sweep debris and can cost between $100 and $300.

articles.title: Deals of the week: Sculpted by Aimee bundles, discounted Dyson Supersonic plus Aldi's baby event
articles.author: Erica Carter
articles.summary: Several companies have launched January sales, offering discounts on various products. Sculpted by Aimee provides bundles with up to 35% off, Arnotts offers up to 70% off homeware, Aldi hosts a Baby and Toddler event, Brown Thomas offers discounts on items like the Dyson Supersonic, Space NK offers up to 50% off, and Woodie's is having a sale on home improvement products.

articles.title: Kanye West Says Adidas Is Holding Him Back, Calls Jerry Lorenzo ‘Corny and Disloyal'
articles.author: Riley Jones
articles.summary: Kanye West's Yeezy brand generated $100 million in sales over six months in 2024. The brand sold over a million pairs of Yeezy Pods and has been developing ten other styles for the past two years. Additionally, Yeezy is collaborating with Russian designer Gosha Rubchinskiy, pricing all products at $20.

articles.title: Pokémon Presents livestream looks set for next month
articles.author: Tom Phillips
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company is anticipated to hold a Pokémon Presents livestream around February 27, 2025, potentially showcasing new developments. This may include updates on Pokémon: Legends Z-A, possibly with a version for Nintendo's expected Switch 2 console, and may even involve the unveiling of the Switch 2 itself.

articles.title: ‘This is the only dry shampoo that works on my greasy hair – it's a gym bag must-have'
articles.author: Laura Mulley
articles.summary: Living Proof introduced Perfect Hair Day Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo featuring a powder removal system to clean hair and neutralize odors. K18 launched Airwash Dry Shampoo, a non-aerosol formula using mineral microbeads to absorb oil. Batiste also offers affordable dry shampoos in various fragrances and colors.

articles.title: Delicious Craft Made ‘Artie Bars'
articles.author: Trent Gilbreath
articles.summary: Starbucks is introducing a new menu to help customers warm up during winter.

articles.title: Workforce Wednesday with Pam Regan of the Missouri Job Service
articles.author: Marian Kelly
articles.summary: Starbucks is introducing a new menu to help customers warm up during the winter season.

articles.title: Samsung Is Giving $50 Off if You Reserve the Upcoming Galaxy S25 Now (No Commitment!)
articles.author: Jowi Morales
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 on January 22 and offering a $50 credit for reservations made on Samsung.com. Customers who reserve the device can also win $5,000 in Samsung Credit and receive up to $1,250 in savings with qualified trade-ins.

articles.title: New Greggs shop opens in Luton Point tomorrow - and a chance to win £20 voucher
articles.author: olivia preston
articles.summary: Greggs is launching a new and improved store in Luton Point. The shop, located next to F Hinds, opens on Thursday, January 9 at 7 am and will offer Greggs favorites. Customers can use Click + Collect via the Greggs App to order.

articles.title: Ninja is restocking its fan-favorite SLUSHi today, but it never lasts long so you'll have to grab it ASAP
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Ninja is restocking the Ninja SLUSHi Professional Frozen Drink Maker at NinjaKitchen.com for $300. This appliance features RapidChill technology and offers XL capacity, allowing users to make various frozen drinks without ice for up to 12 hours. It had an official launch last summer but has been missing from certain retailers and is currently available on Amazon, Walmart, and eBay.

articles.title: Fibocom Debuts Industry-first "AI Buddy" Set to Expand AI-enhanced Interaction to Consumer-centric Scenarios at CES 2025
articles.author: Fibocom Wireless INC
articles.summary: Fibocom launched its industry-first "AI Buddy" at CES 2025. The "AI Buddy" incorporates Fibocom's AI Stack, enabling AI intelligence and enhanced voice-controlled interaction for users in scenarios such as international business negotiations and global travel.

articles.title: You can get a $50 credit when you preorder the next Samsung Galaxy devices
articles.author: Quentyn Kennemer
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its Galaxy S25 family of smartphones at its Unpacked event on January 22nd, 2025. Customers can reserve a pre-order to receive a $50 credit for accessories or a $100 credit for a qualifying 2025 TV or audio device. The Galaxy S25 family may include features like 'Qi2 Ready' wireless charging and enhanced Galaxy AI capabilities.

articles.title: OnePlus 13 vs OnePlus 12: Is the new phone worth upgrading?
articles.author: Anurag Chawake
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus 13 series, featuring the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, a new telephoto camera, and a more refined design compared to the OnePlus 12. The OnePlus 13 offers upgrades including IP68 and IP69 certification, a newer LTPO panel with Ceramic Guard screen protection, OxygenOS 15 with AI features, an improved 50MP ultrawide shooter, and a larger 6,000mAh battery.

articles.title: Washing machine and dryer recommendations
articles.author: Heather Grubola
articles.summary: Consumer Reports recommends LG washing machine and dryer models, including the LG WM4000HWA and LG DLEX4000W set starting at $795 each. The LG WT7000CW HE top-loader is available for $600. The LG DLE3400W Clothes Dryer is recommended for $700.

articles.title: Lexus LBX review: Lexus brings its premium values to the crossover club
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Lexus has launched the LBX, a new compact crossover, targeting younger buyers. The LBX features a 1.5-litre, three-cylinder engine linked to a self-charging battery, generating 134bhp, and achieves 50mpg. Prices start at around £30,000.

articles.title: Sainsbury's new Valentine's Day range sends shoppers 'running' to supermarket
articles.author: Lucy Marshall
articles.summary: Sainsbury's Tu clothing line has launched a new Valentine's themed pyjama range, featuring prints like wine, steak, and lobsters, priced at £25 with a matching eye mask. The range also includes classic pink heart sets and pink and white striped silk pyjamas for £24, offering an alternative to more expensive options. The pyjama sets are available in sizes from XS to XXL and are selling quickly online and in stores.

articles.title: Tide Teams Up with Marvel Studios to Highlight Stain Stories and Host Exclusive, First-Ever "Collateral Stains Screening" Experience for Marvel Studios' Captain America: Brave New World
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tide launched Ultra Oxi Boost Power PODS in January 2025, featuring 2X Oxi power for superior stain removal.  The new Power PODS deliver a powerful clean, removing tough stains without pre-treating. The product launch is accompanied by a collaboration with Marvel Studios' 'Captain America: Brave New World', including an immersive 'Collateral Stains Screening' experience.

articles.title: Keep your cart neat with Amazon's ‘Save for Later' trick
articles.summary: Amazon introduces a "Save for Later" feature on its app, allowing users to stash items they are eyeing without cluttering their cart. This feature allows users to move items from the active cart to a separate section for later purchase. Users can access this section to move items back to the cart or remove them.

articles.title: Lenovo Yoga Slim 9i With Camera-Under-Display Unveiled at CES 2025
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Lenovo unveiled its refreshed Yoga laptop lineup and new IdeaPad devices at CES 2025. A highlight is the Yoga Slim 9i.

articles.title: Retail Landscape in Europe and Middle East to Undergo AI Revolution with New Partnership Between Zoovu and Euronics
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Euronics and Zoovu are partnering to introduce generative AI product advisors for both online and in-store experiences. This collaboration aims to improve product discovery, guide customers to suitable products, and replicate the expertise of in-store salespersons through AI-driven technology. The initiative targets seamless, unified shopping experiences across all consumer touchpoints, potentially boosting online revenue and customer satisfaction.

articles.title: Retail Landscape in Europe and Middle East to Undergo AI Revolution with New Partnership Between Zoovu and Euronics
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Euronics and Zoovu have partnered to introduce AI search and product discovery solutions to Euronics' 27 retailer brands. Zoovu's platform offers AI-driven features like intelligent search, guided selling, and generative AI product advisors. This collaboration aims to enhance customer engagement, improve conversion rates, and provide a consistent shopping experience across online and in-store channels.

articles.title: 'No need for an oven' with 'Ninja Foodi cooker that 'does it all' - save £30 on Amazon
articles.author: Holly Gonsalves
articles.summary: The Ninja multicooker is highlighted as a versatile appliance capable of slow cooking, searing, steaming, braising, baking, and proving. User reviews praise its ability to replace multiple cooking devices, offering convenience and ease of use.  The multicooker provides an alternative to traditional ovens and other appliances.

articles.title: Starbox Unveils StarboxAI-IntelliDistribute, an AI-Driven Smart Information Distribution System to Transform Advertising for 180 Degrees Brandcom
articles.summary: Starbox Group Holdings Ltd. is launching StarboxAI-IntelliDistribute, an AI-driven system designed to optimize advertising processes for companies like 180 Degrees Brandcom. This system will utilize machine learning to enhance advertising strategies for 180 Degrees Brandcom's clientele.

articles.title: Samsungs Galaxy Unpacked Event Set To Reveal The Galaxy S25
articles.author: Tech Moran
articles.summary: Samsung will host its Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22nd in San Jose, California. At the event, Samsung is expected to unveil the Galaxy S25 and announce new Galaxy AI features.

articles.title: Starbox Unveils StarboxAI-IntelliDistribute, an AI-Driven Smart Information Distribution System to Transform Advertising for 180 Degrees Brandcom
articles.author: Starbox Group Holdings Ltd.
articles.summary: Starbox Group Holdings Ltd. has launched StarboxAI-IntelliDistribute, an AI-driven system designed to streamline and optimize advertising. The system offers data-driven insights, content personalization, smart scheduling, and multi-platform integration. 180 Degrees Brandcom, a subsidiary of Starbox, is expected to adopt the system to improve advertising strategies for its clients.

articles.title: Amazon Marketing Cloud's Gen AI Feature Lets Buyers Easily Build and Target Custom Audiences
articles.author: David Cohen
articles.summary: Amazon Marketing Cloud has introduced a new SQL generator feature using generative AI at CES. This feature allows advertisers to use natural language to create SQL queries for building and targeting audiences, which can then be used in Amazon Ads campaigns. The new capability is scheduled to be available to all Amazon Marketing Cloud advertisers early this year.

articles.title: Amazon launches 'cheapest' meal deal at £1 - but there's a catch
articles.author: Rory Poulter
articles.summary: Amazon Fresh has launched a £1 meal deal in its UK stores, offering customers a main course, snack, and drink for a reduced price. This offer includes selections from Amazon Fresh's 'ByAmazon' own-label products like wraps and sausage rolls, and is available until January 31 at select locations.

articles.title: 29 Home Products That Reviewers Are Basically Kicking Themselves For Not Buying Sooner
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article highlights various products available on Amazon, ranging from kitchen gadgets like veggie choppers and cooking oil solidifiers to home organization solutions like lid organizers and cord organizers. These products aim to solve everyday problems and enhance convenience, with reviewers expressing satisfaction and regret for not discovering them earlier.  Several small businesses like YouCopia, Screen Mom, Tidywrap, FryAway, and MioEco are mentioned within the article, noted for their innovative solutions in home and kitchen organization and cleaning.

articles.title: Samsung's Tri-Fold Phone Reportedly Launching Later This Year in Limited Quantities
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is reportedly preparing to launch its first tri-fold smartphone in the second half of 2025. This launch is anticipated to be a part of the Galaxy Unpacked event in July 2025.

articles.title: Samsung's First Tri-Fold Phone to Launch in 2025
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is planning to launch a tri-fold foldable phone in 2025, featuring a 'G' folding mechanism and a 12.4-inch display when fully unfolded. It will have a limited production run of fewer than 300,000 units. The new device distinguishes itself by improved multitasking and screen functionality catering to modern user demands.

articles.title: Sony unveils prototype VR headset Xyn for "creating 3D objects for films, animation, and games"
articles.author: Vikki Blake
articles.summary: Xyn debuted on January 7. Xyn features 4K OLED displays, video passthrough, and support for third-party software. Sony harnessed it for creating 3D objects.

articles.title: Samsung is rolling out a smartphone subscription next month
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Samsung will launch its AI Subscription Club for Galaxy smartphones starting next month, following its initial launch for home appliances in South Korea. The Ballie AI robot will be introduced in Korea and the US, offered through a subscription model in Korea. Samsung is expected to unveil the Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked event in San Jose on January 22nd.

articles.title: Celebrating Success: Ryde and Delivery Chinatown Strengthen Partnership to Elevate Singapore's Delivery Ecosystem
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE 9th
articles.summary: Ryde Group Ltd has partnered with Delivery Chinatown to improve delivery services in Singapore, focusing on Chinatown's F&B merchants. The collaboration leverages Ryde's technology to optimize delivery routes and expand service offerings, ensuring customers can access Chinatown delicacies and fresh produce more conveniently.

articles.title: IFF Unveils China Scent Exploration Program to Drive Next-Generation Fragrance
articles.author: 美通社
articles.summary: IFF launched its China Scent Exploration Program, a consumer learning initiative designed to create fragrances specifically for the Chinese region. The program combines artificial intelligence with cultural insights to help brands develop unique scents that deeply resonate with Chinese consumers. It is built on four strategic pillars: Historical and cultural imprint, Sensorial influences, Consumer insights, and Artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Le Labo Lands in North Loop
articles.author: Madeline Nachbar
articles.summary: Le Labo, a NYC-based perfumery, has debuted a new boutique in North Loop. The brand creates unique hand-blended perfumes and offers personalized bottle labels. Besides perfumes, the boutique also sells gender-neutral fragrances for home and body products like candles, soaps, lotions, and hair care.

articles.title: Indian brands struggle to keep pace with consumer expectations for Gen AI
articles.author: Gopika Nair
articles.summary: Indian brands are increasingly implementing generative AI to enhance customer experiences and personalize services. Hector AI is using generative AI in advertising by combining creativity with data-driven precision. Consumers report improved shopping experiences through AI-driven features like personalized suggestions and custom product designs.

articles.title: Swiggy Launches Snacc, A New App for Quicker Food Deliveries
articles.summary: Swiggy launched Snacc, a new app for delivering ready-to-eat food items within 15 minutes. Snacc aims to provide a faster food delivery option, similar to Swiggy Bolt, and competes with quick commerce services like Blinkit and Zepto. Currently, Snacc is available in cities like Bengaluru, New Delhi, Noida, and Gurugram, offering quick snacks, coffee, and homemade meals, with introductory offers including a free cookie and free delivery.

articles.title: KY startup that counts Walmart, Nestle as customers lands $2.6M venture firms
articles.author: Liz Engel
articles.summary: Nichefire, an AI-powered platform for predicting cultural trends, secured $2.6 million in funding to expand its market reach and improve its AI algorithms. Nichefire's platform identifies and predicts emerging global trends, allowing brands to anticipate consumer behavior and make proactive business decisions and plans to penetrate further into global markets, enhance its AI algorithms to deliver even more precise predictions and expand its relationships with enterprise customers.

articles.title: Aviation companies test out flying taxis
articles.author: Brandon Van Sickel
articles.summary: Starbucks is introducing a new menu to help customers warm up during the winter.

articles.title: Own a BYD and enjoy exclusive 30th anniversary benefits
articles.author: Nisha Joshi
articles.summary: BYD Oman is offering 30th-anniversary benefits, including 3 Years/60,000 kms service for EVs and 5 Years / 50,000 kms for PHEVs, a free EV/PHEV battery charger, first-year insurance, and a gift coupon. This offer is available across the BYD ATTO 3, SEAL, HAN, SONG PLUS, and QIN PLUS models in Oman and reflects BYD's commitment to sustainable transportation.

articles.title: This haptic trackpad for Windows users is the PC accessory I didn't know I needed
articles.author: Kyle Kucharski
articles.summary: Hyper launched the HyperSpace Trackpad Pro at CES 2025, a premium haptic trackpad designed for Windows laptops. The trackpad features customizable options and a large surface area, aiming to provide a superior user experience compared to standard laptop trackpads.

articles.title: 'I don't care if I'm lazy – owning a robot vacuum absolutely blew my mind'
articles.author: Richard Brown
articles.summary: SwitchBot has launched the S10, a robot vacuum cleaner with both hoovering and mopping capabilities, priced at £1,099.99. The product promises '100% automated cleaning' and uses AI for obstacle avoidance. Alternative options like the Shark vacuum cleaner (£441.71) and Lubluelu vacuum cleaner (£169.99) are also available.

articles.title: Samsung's 'next big' mobile launch is coming but don't ignore these Galaxy S24 deals
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its Galaxy S25 range at the annual Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22. The company hints at enhanced AI features for the new Galaxy S series. Currently, customers can claim a free Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Go laptop with the purchase of a Galaxy S24, S24+, or S24 Ultra.

articles.title: Revolutionizing Skincare: Obagi Medical Launches Exclusively on Nykaa
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Obagi Medical has launched its medical-grade skincare products exclusively with Nykaa in India. The launch includes flagship products like the Daily Hydro-Drops Serum and Professional-C Serum, now available online and in select Nykaa stores.

articles.title: 'Time-saving' gadget is 'super practical' for de-icing car - use on 'cold winter mornings'
articles.author: Holly Gonsalves
articles.summary: Amazon is selling a windscreen ice scraper that utilizes rotating blades to clear ice without causing damage. Customer reviews on Amazon are mixed, with some praising its effectiveness on iced glass, while others express disappointment and expect better performance. The product is intended to expedite the process of removing ice from car windscreens.

articles.title: The Dreame X50 Ultra robot vacuum can hop over small obstacles with ease
articles.author: Patrick Hearn
articles.summary: Dreame launched its new flagship vacuum, the Dreame X50 Ultra. This robot vacuum features a ProLeap System that enables it to climb over obstacles up to 6 centimeters in height. It also includes the VersaLift Navigation System for cleaning under furniture.

articles.title: I tried Dyson's new wet and dry vacuum
articles.author: Zoe Moore
articles.summary: Dyson introduced the Dyson Wash G1, a new wet and dry cleaner that eliminates the need to vacuum before mopping. This machine uses water to clean with multiple hydration levels and features a self-cleaning function. It effectively cleans various surfaces and has a run time of up to 35 minutes.

articles.title: Yukai Engineering unveils tiny cat robot that blows on hot food and drinks
articles.author: Gabriella Wong
articles.summary: Yukai Engineering has debuted Nékojita FuFu, a portable cat-shaped robot designed to cool down hot food and beverages, at the Consumer Electronics Show. The robot operates with an internal fan and algorithm to mimic human breath, cooling hot water from 88 to 71 degrees Celsius in three minutes. Yukai Engineering plans to launch Nékojita FuFu in Japan in mid-2025 following a crowdfunding campaign.

articles.title: OnePlus 13 Review
articles.author: Mark Knapp
articles.summary: OnePlus is releasing the OnePlus 13 with a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. The OnePlus 13 features a flat screen, trimmed bezels, flatter metal edges with a matte finish, and a redesigned camera ring. The phone will be available in multiple colors and materials.

articles.title: At CES 2025, a large number of unique products were unveiled that reflected consumers' various taste..
articles.author: Lim Hyung-joon
articles.summary: TCL introduced HeyAimee, a baby doll-shaped robot with AI capabilities, while Anker presented a solar parasol for charging devices. EcoFlow unveiled a cap that charges electronic devices with sunlight. Roborock showcased the Saros Z70, a robot vacuum cleaner equipped with a foldable robot arm capable of picking up small objects.

articles.title: Top Deals on Amazon Electronics: TVs, Kindles and More
articles.author: TMZ
articles.summary: Amazon offers an innovative line of electronics including Echo, Kindle, Amazon Fire, and TVs. Amazon's products aim to improve daily life.

articles.title: Georgina Rodriguez promotes collaboration with Saudi perfume label Laverne
articles.author: Arab News
articles.summary: Laverne, a Saudi perfume label, announced the re-stocking of 'Sense,' a fragrance developed in collaboration with Georgina Rodriguez. The 'Sense' perfume includes notes of blackcurrant, mandarin, jasmine, cashmere and orange blossom. In March 2023, Rodriguez also collaborated with Laverne to promote their fragrance, Blue Laverne.

articles.title: Swiggy's SNACC app will deliver your food in 15 minutes
articles.summary: Swiggy has launched SNACC, a new standalone app designed to deliver quick bites, beverages, and meals in 15 minutes. This marks Swiggy's first major standalone app release in over a decade. Previously, all Swiggy's services were bundled into a single app.

articles.title: Review: This new dual-zone air fryer could change the way you cook
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Salter has launched the XL Air Fryer Oven, featuring a French Door-style opening and a 15-liter capacity. It includes a modular separation system, allowing the internal chamber to be divided into two zones. The air fryer also has a rotisserie attachment for roasting.

articles.title: Review: This new dual-zone air fryer could change the way you cook
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Salter has introduced the Salter XL Air Fryer Oven, featuring a French Door design with a 15-liter capacity and a modular separation system. The air fryer includes a rotisserie attachment and allows for independent temperature and timing control in each zone. It is priced at £109.99.

articles.title: BYD Unveils Yangwang U9 at CES 2025
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: BYD introduced the Yangwang U9, a luxury electric vehicle, at CES 2025. The U9 features a quad-motor drive and advanced suspension technology.

articles.title: QuickAds Launches AI Video Ads to Power Lead Generation for Professionals and Growth-Focused Businesses
articles.author: DNA Web Team
articles.summary: QuickAds.ai launched its AI Video Ads, empowering businesses to create engaging, lead-driving video content faster and more affordably. This platform gives users full ownership of video assets and features tools for brand compliance checks and performance optimization, enabling them to produce effective video ads for product showcases, promotions, and sales campaigns.

articles.title: Like clockwork, the world's biggest gadget festival brings the crazy
articles.author: John Davidson
articles.summary: Companies are developing drink bottles that carbonate water, planters that alert users about plant health, and robot vacuum cleaners with object manipulation capabilities and stair-climbing functionality. These indicate potential future product releases or innovations in existing product lines.

articles.title: SanDisk unveils new portable storage solutions at CES to make creating on the go more a-peel-ing
articles.author: Rosalie Newcombe
articles.summary: SanDisk, a Western Digital-owned brand, will launch the 'SanDisk Creator Series' at CES 2025. This new range includes portable SSDs, microSD cards, and USB flash drives aimed at artists, content creators, and gamers. The series features the SanDisk Creator Phone SSD, a portable solid-state drive available in 1TB and 2TB versions, compatible with multiple operating systems and designed for mobile video capture.

articles.title: Lenovo makes its new Legion Go family official, and I'm fixated on the handheld maker's $499.99 "Steam Deck"
articles.author: Phil Hayton
articles.summary: Lenovo is launching three new Lenovo Legion Go handheld gaming devices. These devices represent a new product line or expansion of Lenovo's gaming offerings, targeting the handheld gaming market.

articles.title: New iPhone Release Lands With Bug Fixes Recommended For All Users
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled the Galaxy S25 Ultra, with pre-orders now open. Nvidia launched the RTX 5090 GPU, which boasts powerful performance in a compact size. Technics introduced new EAH-AZ100 earbuds aiming to compete with Apple's AirPods. OnePlus has unveiled its latest flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 13, and Asus impressed with an affordable Snapdragon-powered laptop featuring a gorgeous OLED display.

articles.title: 2025 BYD Sealion 7 officially announced
articles.author: Samuel Irvine
articles.summary: BYD is launching the Sealion 7, a mid-size electric SUV, in mid-February. The Sealion 7 will feature BYD's 'Blade' battery and offer two variants: a single-motor rear-wheel drive Premium variant and a dual-motor all-wheel drive Performance variant. The SUV will come standard with vehicle-to-load functionality and is available for expressions of interest on the BYD Australia website.

articles.title: Exploring The Range Of Pillow Talk Vape Flavors
articles.summary: Pillow Talk Vape is a vaping brand known for delivering a premium vaping experience. It is considered a preferred choice for many enthusiasts.

articles.title: 6 News at 11 p.m. for 1/7/2025
articles.summary: Starbucks is introducing a new menu to help customers warm up this winter.

articles.title: OnePlus 13 Review: An act of refinement
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: OnePlus is refining the candy bar handset form factor with its latest 13th-generation flagship smartphone.

articles.title: Watch Samsung's new ad for its upcoming Vision AI technology
articles.author: Trevor Mogg
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled Vision AI at CES 2025, an AI-powered technology that transforms TVs and smart devices with personalized features like Click to Search, Live Translate, and Generative Wallpaper. The technology integrates with Samsung Food and smart refrigerators, offering recipes and ingredient ordering. Vision AI also enhances picture and sound quality by dynamically adjusting visuals and audio.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy reserve deal: Get a $50 credit, big trade-in value, and a sweepstakes entry
articles.author: Gabriel Morgan
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its new generation of Galaxy S25 devices, unveiling them at the Unpacked event on January 22, 2025. Customers can reserve the new Samsung Galaxy device to receive a $50 credit and access up to $1,250 in trade-in value. The company aims to be the first to include an advanced AI companion in its smartphones.

articles.title: 2025 BYD Sealion 7 EV: Tesla Model Y rival to start under $60,000
articles.author: James Wong
articles.summary: BYD has confirmed the launch of its new 'pure electric performance SUV'. The SUV will be available in Premium and Performance variants, with the Performance variant capable of accelerating from 0-100km/h in 4.5 seconds.

articles.title: "When I'm working in the kitchen, I feel so confident when the rochoong (robot vacuum cleaner) is sp..
articles.author: a broadcasting fan
articles.summary: Dreame has launched the X40 Ultra robot vacuum cleaner, featuring a robotic arm swing pad, strong suction, and hot water mop cleaning.  The company will also soon release the X50 series equipped with 'robot feet' in Korea. The X40 Ultra was initially released at 1,79,000 won but will be introduced at a discounted price of 1.09 million won through e-commerce for the Lunar New Year's Day.

articles.title: Car Review: New Sentra bargain priced
articles.summary: Nissan is introducing the 2025 Sentra model, which may include a new three-cylinder turbo engine and all-wheel drive. Nissan is also offering a new maintenance plan that includes up to three oil changes in the first two years or 24,000 miles.

articles.title: AI is coming to TV sets
articles.summary: LG and Samsung are introducing their first AI-powered TVs at CES 2025. LG is equipping its new OLED models with Microsoft's Copilot intelligent assistant, while Samsung is integrating its in-house Vision AI technology into its new Neo QLED 8K series. These AI integrations enable features like optimized content viewing through upscaling, automatic HDR adjustments, personalized content recommendations, and intelligent interactions with contextualized information.

articles.title: A path forward for Europe to compete on the internet
articles.author: Nicholas Gruen
articles.summary: Starbucks is introducing new menu items to compete in the value wars. This move represents an expansion of Starbucks's product offerings to cater to a broader customer base and enhance its competitive positioning.

articles.title: If You Love The Feeling Of Sitting In A Clean, Organized Home, Start Off 2025 With These 54 Things
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: The article showcases cleaning and organizing product from various companies. It features products like the Scrub Daddy Damp Duster alternative sponges for dusting, glass jars with bamboo lids and labels for bathroom organization, and Bioclean, a hard water stain remover, addressing needs across different cleaning scenarios. Additionally, it highlights car interior foaming carpet shampoo and a car vacuum for vehicle cleaning.

articles.title: Stuart and Bonnie's, a new concept from Gideon's Bakehouse; Baba Yaga Chicken Truck, by Red Panda Noodle; and more new Orlando restaurants
articles.author: Faiyaz Kara
articles.summary: Several new food and beverage concepts have recently launched. Yummii 2 Go, a fusion restaurant, is now open in Winter Park. KFC has introduced Saucy, a chicken tender concept, in Waterford Lakes. Brix & Mortar Urban Winery & Lounge has opened a third location, and The Good Pour, a philanthropic wine store, has also opened. The Burrow Cafe & Play is opening soon, and Yulnn Meals & Sips has opened its doors, while Stuart & Bonnie's and Baba Yaga Chicken Truck are preparing to launch.

articles.title: OnePlus 13: Best Processor, Discount & Gift
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched its new flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 13, in the Czech Republic. The device features a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, a 120Hz AMOLED display, a 6000mAh battery, and Hasselblad-co-engineered cameras. OnePlus offers an exclusive deal for early adopters, including a discount and a complimentary OnePlus Watch 2R.

articles.title: Hairdryer that hairdressers love: ghd summer sale
articles.author: Olivia Scott
articles.summary: ghd is having a summer sale on several of its hair styling products. These products include the ghd Helios Professional Hair Dryer, which is currently on sale for $280. Also on sale is the new ghd Duet Style 2-in-1 Hot Air Styler in icy blue for $453.75, the ghd Curve Classic Curl Tong, and the Duet Blowdry Hair Dryer Brush Gift Set.

articles.title: Nvidia GeForce Now is coming to Steam Deck, Apple Vision Pro, and more
articles.author: Tomas Franzese
articles.summary: Nvidia is bringing its GeForce Now cloud gaming service to new platforms. A GeForce Now app for Steam Deck is expected later this year, and browser support for Meta Quest 3, Meta Quest 3S, Pico mixed reality headsets, and Apple Vision Pro will be available later this month.

articles.title: Hesai Unveils Mini Hyper-Hemispherical 3D Lidar Series for Robotics at CES
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Hesai (Nasdaq: HSAI) is introducing the new JT series mini 3D lidar. The product features a compact and lightweight design.

articles.title: When and where to pre-order the Midnight Black PlayStation Collection: launch times, info, and best ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Sony's PS5 Midnight Black Collection is launching pre-orders soon. Links to bookmark ahead of the pre-order launch are available.

articles.title: VOBILE PROVIDES COPYRIGHT MANAGEMENT SERVICES FOR GENERATIVE AI ECOSYSTEM
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Vobile Group Limited announced a new product offering of copyright management services. The service aims to address challenges arising from the increase in creative content generated by AI.

articles.title: AI influencer lists top reveals of CES 2025: AI smart glass, robot vacuum, body scanning ...
articles.author: Live Mint
articles.summary: CES 2025 featured the launch of new gadgets. The launched products include AI smart glasses and a personal assistant robot.

articles.title: Samsung strengthens its AI vision across its TV and audio lineup at CES 2025
articles.author: Business Ghana
articles.summary: Samsung announced its 2025 Neo QLED and OLED TVs and audio products at CES 2025. These products are set to push the limits of AI-powered features and functionality.

articles.title: Siemens for Startups
articles.author: Eweekly
articles.summary: Siemens enables startups to accelerate innovation and development by providing venture-related services. This initiative reduces the cost of access to Siemens software and hardware for startups, helping them scale faster. Siemens is collaborating with startups to make customers more competitive, sustainable, and resilient.

articles.title: HERE Technologies empowers SDV automakers to elevate their brand identity with a fully customizable navigation solution
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: HERE Technologies introduced a new SDK variant of HERE Navigation, enabling automakers to customize the user interface to match their brand identities. This cloud-based navigation solution addresses the demand for automotive brands to create unique experiences for their customers.

articles.title: Amazon Marketing Cloud's Gen AI Feature Lets Buyers Easily Build and Target Custom Audiences
articles.author: Adweek
articles.summary: Amazon is enhancing its Marketing Cloud platform with a new feature powered by generative artificial intelligence. This addition represents an update to the existing service, introducing AI capabilities.
